name: StandardFlow-Output-Generator
content:
StandardFlow Output Generator Application


Project Overview


Objective:

The StandardFlow Output Generator is a document transformation tool that enables users to upload a document (PDF) and convert it into a region-specific format tailored for different countries. This platform ensures that documents adhere to the formatting and regulatory requirements of the selected country.


Key Features:

  1. Document Upload
  • Users can upload common documents (e.g., PDF files).
  • Drag-and-drop or browse functionality is available for ease of use.
  1. Country-Specific Formatting
  • Supported regions include:
  • US
  • EU
  • Canada
  • Australia
  • Select the country to which the document should be adapted using the regional toggle buttons.
  1. Document Viewing and Management
  • Uploaded documents are listed under the Input Documents section.
  • Generated output documents can be viewed in the Output Document section.
  1. Automated Document Generation
  • After selecting a region, the tool transforms the document to meet that country's specific requirements with the click of the Create Document button.


How to Use:

  1. Uploading a Document
  • Go to the "Upload Common Document" section.
  • Drag and drop your PDF file into the upload area or click "browse" to locate and upload your file.
  1. Selecting a Region
  • Choose the region-specific document format by selecting one of the following options:
  • US
  • EU
  • Canada
  • Australia
  1. Generating the Output Document
  • Once the document is uploaded and a region is selected, click the Create Document button.
  1. Viewing Documents
  • View your input documents in the "Input Documents" section.
  • Access regionally formatted output documents in the "Output Document" section.


Use Case:

For example, a user uploads a U.S.-based vaccine PDF document (such as "US_Vaccine.pdf") and wishes to convert it into the Australian document format. They:

  1. Upload the "US_Vaccine.pdf" file.
  2. Select "Australia" from the region selection.
  3. Click Create Document to generate the output tailored to Australia's format.
  4. View and download the updated document from the Output Document section.

This tool is ideal for businesses, researchers, or organizations that need to convert documents to align with international standards efficiently.
